pages.text: The Grape Ape Strain$(br2)Base THC: 18% $(br)Base CBD: 7% $(br)Effect: Aroused
Grape Ape Weed can be obtained by grinding your Fresh or Dried buds in a Grinder machine or using the manual grinder.
Grape Ape Seeds can be planted on farmland or inside the Grow Pot
Grape Ape Extract can be gained through the DNA Process or by extracting Grape Ape Weed in an Extractor
You can package your grape ape weed for easier distribution or selling to the stoner villager.
